games.title: Baba Game
games.description: A fun casual game where you mark places you've visited. Explore different locations and collect achievements!
games.controls: Use mouse or touch to interact with the game interface. Click on locations to mark them as visited.
games.author: LightGame Team

games.title: Beat the Cat
games.description: Tired of seeing that neurotic cat all over your social feed? Now it's time to beat it! A fun casual game that tests your reaction speed and hand-eye coordination.
games.controls: Click on the cat to beat it before it escapes. The faster your reaction, the higher your score!
games.author: LightGame Team
features: Simple and easy to play gameplay

games.title: Bomb Defense Strategy
games.description: A strategic defense game where you must protect your base from incoming threats. Plan your defenses and react quickly to survive!
games.controls: Click to place defenses and interact with game elements. Use strategy to position your defenses effectively.
games.author: LightGame Team

games.title: Bun Eating Contest
games.description: A fun casual game where you see how many steamed buns you can eat in a limited time! Test your speed and reaction skills.
games.controls: Click on the buns to eat them. Try to eat as many as possible within the time limit to get a high score.
games.author: LightGame Team

games.title: Dragon Rescue Mission
games.description: Help the dragon rescue his son in this exciting action-adventure game. Navigate through challenges and obstacles to complete your mission!
games.controls: Use touch controls to move and interact. Collect items and avoid obstacles to progress through levels.
games.author: LightGame Team

games.title: OCD Challenge 2
games.description: A challenging puzzle game that tests your attention to detail and perfectionist tendencies. Clear all the notifications and organize everything perfectly!
games.controls: Tap to clear notifications and organize items. Pay attention to details and complete each level perfectly.
games.author: LightGame Team

games.title: Picture Puzzle Challenge
games.description: A visual puzzle game featuring beautiful images. Solve puzzles by arranging pieces correctly and test your problem-solving skills!
games.controls: Click and drag to move puzzle pieces. Arrange all pieces correctly to complete each level.
games.author: LightGame Team

games.title: Snake Game
games.description: The classic Snake game where you control a snake to eat food and grow longer. Be careful not to hit the walls or yourself!
games.controls: Use Arrow Keys to move the snake. Eat the food to grow longer. Avoid hitting walls and your own tail.

games.title: Space Shooter
games.description: Defend Earth from waves of alien invaders in this classic arcade-style space shooter. Dodge enemy fire and collect power-ups to upgrade your weapons.
games.controls: Use Arrow Keys or WASD to move your spaceship. Press Space to shoot. Avoid enemy ships and their projectiles.

games.title: Steps of Wonder
games.description: A challenging puzzle game that tests your intelligence and strategy. Push your thinking to the limit. Every step matters in this thrilling brain teaser!
games.controls: Click on the blocks to move them. Try to solve the puzzle with as few steps as possible. Careful thinking and planning is required for each move.
games.author: LightGame Team

games.title: Tetris
games.description: The classic block-stacking puzzle game. Arrange falling blocks to create complete lines and prevent the blocks from stacking up to the top.
games.controls: Use Arrow Left/Right to move, Arrow Down to speed up descent, Arrow Up to rotate, Space to hard drop.

games.title: Tower Defense
games.description: Classic tower defense game where you build defensive towers to prevent enemy invasion. Plan your resources wisely and survive 10 waves of enemies!
games.controls: Click to select tower type, then click on the map to place it. Basic Tower ($50): Normal attack; Cannon Tower ($100): High damage; Ice Tower ($150): Slows enemies.
games.author: LightGame Team
features: Three different types of defense towers: Basic Tower, Cannon Tower, and Ice Tower
Multiple enemy types including Normal, Fast, and Tank enemies
10 waves of enemies with increasing difficulty
Resource management system to allocate money for building towers
